mapper.insert: insert into carpool values(cp_num_seq.nextval, #{cp_id}, #{cp_depart}, #{cp_arrive}, to_date(#{cp_time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI'), sysdate, #{cp_sum}, #{cp_distance}, 0)
mapper.select: select count(*) from carpool where cp_valid = 0 and to_char(cp_regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
select count(*) from carpool where cp_valid = 0

select * from (select rownum rnum, cp_num, cp_id, cp_depart, cp_arrive, cp_time, cp_regdate, cp_sum, cp_distance from (select * from carpool where cp_valid = 0
order by cp_regdate desc
order by cp_distance desc
order by cp_sum desc
) ) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
